instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 will only turn on when battery is plugged but it wont charge, magsafe will turn orange when machine is turned off.
threads.message:
without battery, when 1st plug in, I can hear the chime but screen is black and the fan will spin up for 5 seconds before it repeat, when it repeats, I hear no more chime.

when plugged a battery, it will boot up, sometimes normal speed and sometimes very slowly, and it wont charge the battery either as it stayed green.

When it is shutdown, then magsafe will turn orange.

U7000: 
17/18 = 3 ohm
27/28 = 21 ohm

threads.title: 820-2936 will only turn on when battery is plugged but it wont charge, magsafe will turn orange when machine is turned off.
threads.message:
Any history available?
Did you try starting in SMC bypass mode?

threads.title: 820-2936 will only turn on when battery is plugged but it wont charge, magsafe will turn orange when machine is turned off.
threads.message:
unknown history.. minor corrosion around C4314/L4310, also C7524 and then some unknown liquid residue around C7623/Q7520.. I cleaned them off with alcohol.

C7042 which is around U7000 seems to have corrosion around it...I have replaced C7042 and it seems to be ok now.. let me do some more testing..
